content: @Grahame Grieve I'm all done with the C-CDA on FHIR IG. Everything committed. Not sure if @Rick Geimer still working on it as he appears to gone offline...
yay I have a gold build for this. thanks
We do have an issue around linking to a dependency not in svn. I've hacked around that for now. Will get back to it and do a proper solution once publication is done
